title: `thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: pos.get() <= self.position()', compiler\rustc_metadata\src\rmeta\encoder.rs`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
This just started getting thrown in [my CI](https://github.com/GregoryConrad/mimir/actions/runs/4186775685/jobs/7258890725) earlier today on `1.67.1` stable. Using [cargo-xwin](https://github.com/rust-cross/cargo-xwin) to build for `x86_64-pc-windows-msvc` on a `windows-latest` GitHub Actions runner. Failed to compile crate `lindera-ko-dic`:

(Ignore the out of space error at the end of the CI; that is a bit after the error in question was raised. See the "build the binaries" step.)

